location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter to John Beaumont and George Green, Factors at Bushire from William Digges LaTouche and George Abraham at Bussora (Basra)

mods.abstract: Letter speculates that the Vakeel (referring to Karim Khan) will not carry out his threats of destroying Bussora [Basra] and states that it is likely that the town will soon revert to Turkish rule. Shipped by Hamdan Carack boat.
